name: 葉雯玓
objective: 介紹體驗行銷之理論基礎及技巧以作為產品設計開發的策略，結合策略體驗模組及體驗媒介於產品設計之應用，以達創造出對顧客有價值的產品體驗之目標。
schedule:
Week 1: 　　介紹課程概述、教學計畫、課程內容、進行方式、進度、成績評量方式說明
師生交換學習計畫之意見
Week 2:  　　Brand and Marketing 
The Experience Economy and Experiential Marketing
Week 3:  　　Psychological marketing method
Story always touches and sells
Week 4: 　　Strategic Experiential Modules and Experience Providers
Week 5:  論文研讀報告
Week 6:  論文研讀報告
Week 7:  論文研讀報告
Week 8:  Project Proposal
Week 9: 　　期中考試週
Week 10: Data Collection
Week 11: Data Collection and Data Analysis 
Week 12: Data Analysis
Week 13: Data Analysis and Preparation of the Project Report
Week 14: Final Presentation of the Project
Week 15: Design application
Week 16: Design application
Week 17: Design application
Week 18: 期末考試週
scorePolicy:
